PluginData.Author: Viktor
PluginData.Tooltip: Cycling grouped cameras with a toolbar button
PluginData.Description:
Allows viewing groups of cameras in a round-robin manner using only a single toolbar slot.
More information: https://github.com/viktor-ferenczi/se-camera-group
For support join the SE Mods Discord: https://discord.gg/PYPFPGf3Ca
Please consider supporting my work on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/semods
Thank you!
